set.title: Set
set.text: A set is a collection of things or objects (called elements). Every element can only appear one in a set. We write sets using {}s, for example, a set containing the numbers 2, 3 and 4 would be written as {2, 3, 4}.

coordinate-system.title: Coordinate system
coordinate-system.text: A coordinate system is a two-dimensional plane that contains two perpendicular axes. Every point on the plane can be defined using two numbers (coordinates), that specify its distance from the two axes.

function.title: Function
function.text: A function is a mathematical relation that converts an input x into exactly one output fx.
